welcome_title: Welcome to Our Amazing SvelteKit App
welcome_subtitle: A modern, themeable, and multilingual web application
feature_themes_desc: Choose from various color schemes and dark/light modes
feature_i18n_desc: Support for multiple languages with Paraglide
feature_responsive_desc: Works perfectly on all devices and screen sizes
feature_modern_desc: Built with SvelteKit, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript
about_desc: This application demonstrates modern web development practices with internationalization and theming capabilities.
